# Examples

simulation scenarios.


## Weight based dosing 

```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
cat(gsub("(^|\n) *# ", "\\1### ",
         unlist(knitr::knit_child(text = readLines("RxODE/man-roxygen/rmdhunks/RxODE-wt.Rmd"),
                                  envir = environment(), quiet = TRUE))), sep="\n")
```
